column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////As for our flight selections
column2: I want to make sure you weren't misinformed. We actually have 2 bourbon flights
column4: and 1 Japanese flight. They're all listed in the back of our whiskey book. However
column5: you can create a flight from any of our 280 bottles. Just let us know which ones you want to taste. We'll set you up with three 1oz pour of the chosen whiskies. The cost is just half of what a regular shot would be.
